OCC: Pathetic in battle? They must not know who they are dealing with here,
just wait and see...

Sinesis and Sinister were suddenly fighting side by side again, and not
doing a very good job, neither! Assassins versus Ninja warriors, who could
win? Deemos threw Sinesis through the air with the greatest of ease. Sinesis
jumped back up, but Deemos shoulder blocked him and down he went again.
Sinister fires at Inzola, but she spins around and suddenly pulls out a
shield, blocking the attacks. The minor wounds Deemos and Inzola had started
to heal.

"Aim at their sparks..." Sinesis whispered to Sinister. Sinister palyed
dead. Sinesis roared in rage and tried to fight them both. Deemos and Inzola
simply stcuk their cannon to his head and fired. He flew back and also
played dead, even though those shots hurt like the pit. Deemos and Inzola
looked at each other and laughed, they expected them to fall for this? Then
there was a ticking sound. Like a grenade. Inzola and Deemos looked behind
them, but the grenade was a dud. Inzola turned around and both Sinesis and
Sinister fired into her chest. Bang! Inzola flew backwards, a hole in her
chest and her spark showing. Deemos spun a staff around in circles and
chopped Sinister to pieces! Sinesis knocked Deemos down and scrambled to
Inzola. He noticed the machine and ripped it out.

"Healing device, eh?" Sinesis said. He jabbed his claw into it, destroying
it. A spark flew around and glowed before him. Lightmare's spark. It
crackled a few times and fell to the ground, fading away to go wherever it's
final destination was. Sinesis looked at it in puzzlement when it
diappeared.

"Never turn your back on your opponent!" Deemos said, he swung his staff and
Sinesis went down. Sinesis pulled out a grenade, a small one. Deemos grabbed
it from him and it shot a laser beam into Deemos' chest and blew him in
half. Sinesis stumbled over, his sneaky trick winning him the battle. He cut
a hole in Deemos' chest and extracted another healing device. He ripped this
one open and another spark was flying around. Sinesis tried to catch it, but
this one wasn't ready for the Matrix. Sinesis sighed and pulled out his
blaster to shoot it. Sinesis felt a burning pain in his back, and Deemos was
standing behind him, self reattached with a bit of bonding. He simply cut
down Sinesis, picked up Inzola, and started walking away. Sineesis and
Sinister's parts lay in the battlefield, the spark of Gangon floating in
front of BrightBlade...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 12, 2000 9:38 AM
Subject: Neo Beast Wars


> ::Perndabot/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/DevilDuer::
>
> Perndabot, Reptilica, and Bloodystrike look slightly confused as Sinister
and
> Sinesis start figting Deemoz and Inzola. The three Alliance members take a
> step back, letting the little battle proceed, guns still aimed at the
croud.
> Perndabot looks over at BrightBlade.
>
> "Thank you," he says modestly, "They were pathetic in battle, I'm afraid."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> DevilDuer runs up to the fight, gun aimed. Seeing the rest of the Alliance
> members that were there not firing, he stops too.
